snippet.title: Building Relationships - Official Reveal Trailer | Day of the Devs 2024
snippet.description:
Watch the Building Relationships trailer for the upcoming adventure game where you roll, dash, and jump around as a house. Developed by Tan Ant Game, Building Relationships encourages players to explore a quiet island packed with a wide range of biomes, meet wacky structures with unique personalities, uncover secrets, and more. 

Building Relationships is coming to PC via Steam. It’s available to wishlist now.
